trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Limit-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Limit-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Limit-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Limit-EventLog

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Sets the event log properties that limit the size of the event log and the age of its entries.
trans-unit.target: 設定限制事件記錄檔大小和其項目存留期的事件記錄檔屬性。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Limit-EventLog** cmdlet sets the maximum size of a classic event log, how long each event must be retained, and what happens when the log reaches its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: **Limit-eventlog** 指令程式會設定大小上限的傳統事件記錄檔、 多久必須保留每個事件，以及記錄檔達到大小上限時，會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to limit the event logs on local or remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它來限制本機電腦或遠端電腦上的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that contain the EventLog noun (the EventLog cmdlets) work only on classic event logs.
trans-unit.target: 包含 EventLog 名詞 (EventLog Cmdlet) 的 Cmdlet 只能用於傳統事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: To get events from logs that use the Windows Event Log technology in Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, use Get-WinEvent.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 中，若要從使用「Windows 事件記錄檔」技術的記錄檔中取得事件，請使用 Get-WinEvent。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Increase the size of an event log
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 增加事件記錄檔的大小

trans-unit.source: This command increases the maximum size of the Windows PowerShell event log on the local computer to 20480 bytes (20 KB).
trans-unit.target: 此命令將本機電腦上 Windows PowerShell 事件記錄檔的大小上限增加到 20480 位元組 (20 KB)。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Retain an event log for a specified duration
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 指定持續期間保留事件記錄檔

trans-unit.source: This command ensures that events in the Security log on the Server01 and Server02 computers are retained for at least 7 days.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會確保將 Server01 和 Server02 電腦上 Security 事件記錄檔中的事件至少保留 7 天。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Change the overflow action of all event logs
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 變更所有事件記錄檔溢位的動作

trans-unit.source: This example changes the overflow action of all event logs on the local computer to OverwriteOlder.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會變更為 OverwriteOlder 的本機電腦上的所有事件記錄檔的溢位動作。

trans-unit.source: The first command gets the log names of all of the logs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令取得本機電腦上所有記錄檔的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The second command sets the overflow action.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令設定溢位動作。

trans-unit.source: The third command displays the results.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令顯示結果。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Specifies remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 指定遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 預設是本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an Internet Protocol (IP) address, or a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 NetBIOS 名稱、 網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址或遠端電腦的完整的網域名稱 (FQDN)。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, type the computer name, a dot (.), or localhost.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本機電腦，請輸入電腦名稱、 句點 （.） 或 localhost。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此參數不必依賴 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *ComputerName* parameter of **Limit-EventLog** even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *ComputerName* 參數 **Limit-eventlog** 即使您的電腦未設定為執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -LogName
trans-unit.target: -LogName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the event logs.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Enter the log name (the value of the Log property; not the LogDisplayName) of one or more event logs, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 輸入一或多個事件記錄檔的記錄檔名稱 (Log 屬性的值，而不是 LogDisplayName)，並使用逗號區隔。

trans-unit.source: -MaximumSize
trans-unit.target: -MaximumSize

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum size of the event logs in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件記錄檔的大小上限 (單位為位元組)。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value between 64 kilobytes (KB) and 4 gigabytes (GB).
trans-unit.target: 輸入介於 64 KB 到 4 GB 之間的值。

trans-unit.source: The value must be divisible by 64 KB (65536).
trans-unit.target: 此值必須可被 64 KB (65536) 整除。

trans-unit.source: This parameter specifies the value of the **MaximumKilobytes** property of the **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** object that represents a classic event log.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數指定之值的 **MaximumKilobytes** 屬性 **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** 物件，代表傳統事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: -OverflowAction
trans-unit.target: -OverflowAction

trans-unit.source: Specifies what happens when the event log reaches its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 指定當事件記錄檔達到大小上限時要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此參數接受的值包括：

trans-unit.source: DoNotOverwrite: Existing entries are retained and new entries are discarded.
trans-unit.target: DoNotOverwrite︰ 保留現有的項目，並會捨棄新的項目。

trans-unit.source: OverwriteAsNeeded: Each new entry overwrites the oldest entry.
trans-unit.target: OverwriteAsNeeded︰ 每個新的項目會覆寫舊的項目。

trans-unit.source: OverwriteOlder: New events overwrite events older than the value specified by the **MinimumRetentionDays** property.
trans-unit.target: OverwriteOlder︰ 新事件覆寫所指定的值超過 **MinimumRetentionDays** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: If there are no events older than specified by the **MinimumRetentionDays** property value, new events are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何事件比指定的 **MinimumRetentionDays** 屬性值將會捨棄新的事件。

trans-unit.source: This parameter specifies the value of the **OverflowAction** property of the **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** object that represents a classic event log.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數指定之值的 **OverflowAction** 屬性 **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** 物件，代表傳統事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: -RetentionDays
trans-unit.target: -RetentionDays

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum number of days that an event must remain in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件必須保留在事件記錄檔中的天數下限。

trans-unit.source: This parameter specifies the value of the **MinimumRetentionDays** property of the **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** object that represents a classic event log.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數指定之值的 **MinimumRetentionDays** 屬性 **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** 物件，代表傳統事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pip input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法 pip 輸入至此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: To use this cmdlet on Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, open Windows PowerShell with the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 上使用這個指令程式，以執行系統管理員身分開啟 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet changes the properties of the **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** object that represents a classic event log.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式變更的內容 **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** 物件，代表傳統事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: To see the current settings of the event log properties, type `Get-EventLog -List`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看事件記錄檔屬性的目前設定，請輸入 `Get-EventLog -List`。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Clear-EventLog

trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.target: Limit-EventLog

trans-unit.target: New-EventLog

trans-unit.target: Remove-EventLog
